title: The Trouble with Terry
description: "Everything I do turns out wrong!" Terry wails. Poor Terry! She makes a promise to her best friend--and forgets all about it. She boils eggs on the stove-- and they explode. She helps her brother deliver papers-- and hits her teacher in the stomach with the Evening News! Here's Terry in one funny mishap after another-- and a wonderful surprise at the end.
author: Joan M. Lexau
